name: papascott
text:
Nothing real exciting, just starting to style my story pages. I'm not much of a designer, but I'm good at copy-and-paste (in this case, from the Lanyon theme I use on my main blog). I added Lanyon's css files plus a css file of my own to the template.

Click-to-edit still works. And while digging around trying to find how the %text% macro in the template is assembled, I now know it's on the client side (in chat.js), not the server.
